amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to call for a GAO report on the challenges and progress made in making elections accessible for those with disabilities, including an assessment of the impact of changes included in H.R. 1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Moore.
